text: Huda Tower is a skyscraper located in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. The 24 story building was completed in 2004, and houses the Ethiopia headquarters of the Sheikh Mohammed Hussein Al Amoudi-owned company MIDROC.http://www.emporis.com/buildings/202786/huda-tower-addis-ababa-ethiopia Emporis Page Construction commenced in 1998, and ceased in 2004.http://skyscraperpage.com/cities/?buildingID=30592 Skyscraper Page ==See also== *Skyscraper design and construction *List of tallest buildings in Africa ==References== Category:2004 establishments in Ethiopia Category:Buildings and structures in Addis Ababa Category:Hotel buildings completed in 2004
title: Huda Tower
